title: Limbo
description: The epic conclusion of ’The Limbo Prophecy.’FBI agents Canopus, Keel and Turner, find themselves trapped in Limbo along with the Hedge witch, Butler, Evermore the Jinn and the unhinged serial killer, Hedy 'The Ferret' Hilden, in a quest to defeat the demon, Baal.As Keel and the others are dragged deeper through Limbo and the many rooms of the mysterious Charon hall, they not only face their sins of the past but of their future too, as they discover the true identity of Baal and the sacrifices, they must make to finally fulfil the prophecy and save the world.
author: Stephen Jarrett
